sentences.en: "I want to send a telegram." — "Fine, to whom?"
sentences.cn: “我想发份电报。”——“好的，发给谁？”

sentences.en: "Send her away," Eve said in a cold, hard voice.
sentences.cn: “把她打发走。”伊芙冷酷无情地说道。

sentences.en: Applicants are asked to send in a CV and a covering letter.
sentences.cn: 申请人需要提交一份简历和附函。

sentences.en: Bainbridge sent down 25 overs and finished with 5 for 44.
sentences.cn: 贝恩布里奇投球25轮，跑动5次，积44分。

sentences.en: Come on, Bill. Send Tom a card and make his day.
sentences.cn: 来吧，比尔。给汤姆寄张卡片让他高兴高兴吧。

sentences.en: Cut out the coupon and send those cheques off today.
sentences.cn: 剪下优惠券，并于今天把支票寄出去。

sentences.en: don't forget to send in your entries for our summer competition.
sentences.cn: 别忘了给我们的夏季竞赛投来你的参赛作品。

sentences.en: For more details about these products, send a postcard marked HB/FF.
sentences.cn: 要了解这些产品的详细信息，请寄来标明HB/FF字样的明信片。

sentences.en: he sent word that he was busy.
sentences.cn: 他传来话说他很忙。

sentences.en: I'd have to send Tina on ahead with Rachael.
sentences.cn: 我只有让蒂娜和雷切尔一起先行一步。

sentences.en: I've got your catalogue—would you like me to send it on?.
sentences.cn: 我已收到你的目录——是否要我将它转寄出去？。

sentences.en: If I don't send a picture, he will smell a rat.
sentences.cn: 如果我不寄出照片，他将有所察觉。

sentences.en: If you have any problems then send me some mail.
sentences.cn: 如有任何疑问，就给我发邮件。

sentences.en: It would be uneconomical to send a brand new tape.
sentences.cn: 寄一盘新磁带过去不合算。

sentences.en: Lambert gave Luckwell a hefty shove to send him on his way.
sentences.cn: 兰伯特用力推了勒克韦尔一把，把他送上了路。

sentences.en: Let's send out for a pizza and watch The Late Show.
sentences.cn: 我们叫一份外卖比萨然后看《深夜秀》吧。

sentences.en: Lyn sent some pictures of the wedding.
sentences.cn: 琳恩寄了几张婚礼照片。

sentences.en: Mr Ellison is here. Shall I send him in (= tell him to enter the room ) ?
sentences.cn: 埃利森先生来了，要不要我去叫他进来？

sentences.en: please take a moment or two to send off a cheque to a good cause.
sentences.cn: 请抽出一点时间为一项崇高事业寄发一张支票。

sentences.en: radar signals were sent out in powerful pulses.
sentences.cn: 雷达信号以强脉冲发出。

sentences.en: Send a cheque for £18.99 plus £2 for postage and packing.
sentences.cn: 请寄上18.99英镑的支票，外加2英镑的邮资和包装费。

sentences.en: Send your details on a card to the following address.
sentences.cn: 在明信片上写明你的近况寄到下面的地址。

sentences.en: she sent him off to a lecturing engagement.
sentences.cn: 他派她去举行演讲。

sentences.en: the company sent out written information about the stock.
sentences.cn: 公司以书面形式发布了股票信息。

sentences.en: The United Nations is sending troops.
sentences.cn: 联合国正在派遣军队。

sentences.en: These days, cartoonists send in their work by fax.
sentences.cn: 现在卡通画家用传真机发送作品。

sentences.en: you can send away for the recipe.
sentences.cn: 你可以来函索取处方。

sentences.en: you're going to get sent down for possessing drugs.
sentences.cn: 你将会因拥有毒品而被判处监禁。

words.tran_cn: [邮] 寄件人；发送人；发报机
发送；[通信] 发射；信件
发送，寄；派遣；使进入；发射

phrases.tran_cn: v. 发送；派遣；解雇；驱逐
把…向下发送；使下降（价格等）；开除
召唤，派人去叫；派人去拿
使变得；使处于某种状态
转寄；（人到达前）先行发送（邮件，行李）
射出；使上升；长出；检举；提出；[口]判决入狱

trans.tran_en: to arrange for something to go or be taken to another place, especially by post

trans.tran_cn: 寄，发送，传达，派遣，打发，使快速移动，使进入(某种状态)
trans.tran_en: to arrange for something to go or be taken to another place, especially by post

trans.tran_cn: 发送，寄；派遣，打发；促使，使进入；发送，发射
trans.tran_en: to arrange for something to go or be taken to another place, especially by post
